regions.name: Gatelands
regions.description: The Gatelands is a region in the eastern and central parts of the Carja Sundom in Horizon Zero Dawn.

regions.name: The Cut
regions.description: The Cut is the name that the Banuk use to refer to the region due south of Ban-Ur, that was visited by the Nora Aloy in Horizon Zero Dawn: The Frozen Wilds.

regions.name: The Embrace
regions.description: The Embrace, sometimes called All-Mother's Embrace, is a small valley region in the southwestern part of the Nora Sacred Lands in Horizon Zero Dawn.

regions.name: Valleymeet
regions.description: The Valleymeet is a region in Horizon Zero Dawn north of Mother's Crown. It is so-named because a number of valleys north of the Sacred Lands join here.

regions.name: Burning Shores
regions.description: The Burning Shores are the playable location of Horizon Forbidden West: Burning Shores. The Burning Shores were mentioned in datapoints in Horizon Forbidden West.

regions.name: Dry Yearn
regions.description: The Dry Yearn is a region in Horizon Forbidden West.
